lead_paragraph: Shire’s merger machine has taken a gentle knock. Shire, the onetime Irish target for AbbVie, is planning a mega-deal of its own. Unlike the previous combination, Shire’s $30 billion lunge for Baxalta carries a fair slug of industrial logic, as well as tax benefits. Its shareholders, though, still need some persuading.

headline.main: Shire’s Merger Machine Stumbles on Baxalta Bid
